post:
Infinite Technologies provides offshore web hosting, email and sever colocation and leasing services. We operate 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year. We have on duty and standby staff monitoring the data-center, network and servers 24 hours, even on public holidays!

Our primary servers are co-located in the TM Net Data Center located in CyberJaya, Malaysia. While our German servers are co-located at Avaya-Tenovis Data-Center located in Frankfurt, Germany. Both the data centers high multiple bandwidth global communication providers. To name a few, the major bandwidth providers are De-Cix, Global Crossing, Rix Port|80 among others.

What services do we offer?
Offshore Virtual Servers, VPS - Virtuozzo Powered Servers
Offshore VPS, Virtual Private Servers are available in both our data-centers. Germany and Malaysia.
Upto: 60 GB Storage Space
Upto: 3500 GB Bandwidth
Upto: 1 GB RAM
Control Panel options between Webmin, DirectAdmin, cPanel/WHM or Plesk!
Prices start at 45.99 USD / month with addons and upgrades available.

Offshore Dedicated Servers - RedHat Linux and Microsoft Windows Powered Servers
Offshore Dedicated Servers are available in both our data-centers. Germany and Malaysia.
Upto: Dual Xeon 2x3.0 GHz
Upto: 4 GB ECC RAM
Upto: 2x200 GB HDD
Control Panel options between Webmin, DirectAdmin, cPanel/WHM or Plesk!
Prices start at 95.99 USD / month with addons and upgrades available.

More information on Offshore Shared Hosting.

Want more Information?
You can find more contact details on our contact us page.
You can find more details our data-center on our network and data center page.
